title: How to Build a Minecraft Cottage

steps.title: Place 4 logs of any type in a 5 by 5 square.
steps.content: Place 4 logs of any type in a 5 by 5 square.

steps.title: Place 3 planks, preferably the same kind of wood you used for the logs, in between each log.
steps.content: Place 3 planks, preferably the same kind of wood you used for the logs, in between each log. One side will have the door, so be sure to leave a space in the middle for it. If you have an eye for designing, you can use different logs and planks that look good together.

steps.title: Place one log above each wood log that you have.
steps.content: Place one log above each wood log that you have. Place a wooden plank next to each new log, leaving space for windows (if desired).

steps.title: Add a door and (optionally) some glass panes for windows.
steps.content: Add a door and (optionally) some glass panes for windows.

steps.title: Place cobblestone on the top of your house.
steps.content: Place cobblestone on the top of your house. This should form a roof. You could also use wood logs and planks.

steps.title: Add cobblestone stairs to the edges of your roof.
steps.content: Add cobblestone stairs to the edges of your roof.

steps.title: Add torches on the inside of your cottage.
steps.content: Add torches on the inside of your cottage. If there are no torches on the inside, hostile mobs will spawn inside your house.

steps.title: Decorate your cottage.
steps.content: Decorate your cottage. To start off, put in a crafting table, a furnace, a few chests and a bed.

steps.title: Add cobblestone stairs all the way up your roof, forming a small pyramid.
steps.content: Add cobblestone stairs all the way up your roof, forming a small pyramid. This step is optional, but it will make your house look nicer.

steps.title: Add flowers of your choice along the sides of your house.
steps.content: Add flowers of your choice along the sides of your house. Since the new update, there are plenty of flowers to choose from. An alternating pattern will look the nicest.

steps.title: Add a rooftop garden!
steps.content: Add a rooftop garden! You need a flat roof, some dirt, ladders for getting up there (stairs are too cramped) water, fences and seeds. Lay out the fences along the edge of your roof, so you won't fall off.

steps.title: Create a secret underground tunnel!
steps.content: Create a secret underground tunnel! Make a deep (at least 3 blocks) hole underneath the floor, and add ladders so you can climb down. Then start a tunnel leading to a secret room! Maybe a pool, a doghouse, a cool bedroom- anything you want! Remember, since this is a secret tunnel, nobody but you should know where it is.

steps.title: Here's something you can do once you've built your house:
steps.content: Here's something you can do once you've built your house: Mine the logs , (logs are the wood straight from the tree with bark and all, planks are logs that you get by crafting. Place logs one block outwards from where they were in the beginning. You should now have a one-block space in between the corners of your house. Extend the roof to these logs. Underneath this new roof space is a good spot to add flowers.
